Caption: Figure 5: Learning curves for the meeting scenario models.
Mention:
We trained 15 different models, the first based off the first 
training sample, the second based off the first and second 
training samples, and so on. We repeated this in creating a 
new set of models for the 1-person meeting samples. We did 
this to determine the number of demonstrations needed to 
create a robust model with a CAPpella: approximately 6 
(Figure 5). Training a model with a new demonstration took 
approximately 8 seconds with our data samples.
